https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v7GkDorZgmD090U4Uhf0g6gng05.jpg Christmas is supposed to be a time of joy, peace and goodwill. But for some folks in the small town of Bailey Downs, it turns into something much less festive. A Christmas Horror Story
